Observability: TARS displays pilot's checklist progress; Pilotconfirms ATC clearance status.
Predictability: Pilot anticipates TARS's checklist next steps.
Directability: Pilot can command TARS to recheck an item.
Information Requirement: ATC clearance status, checklist completion status.

Observability: TARS must display sensed pitot-static status to pilot.
Information Requirement: Pitot-static switch status

Observability: TARS displays sensed engine anti-ice status changes to pilot and requirement.
Information Requirement: Outside air temperature, engine anti-ice switch position.

Observability: TARS displays windshield anti-ice status and requirement
Predictability: TARS alerts pilot if anti-ice status deviates from requirement.
Information Requirement: Windshield anti-ice switch position, current weather conditions.

Observability: TARS display PAX SAFETY switch status to pilot.
Information Requirement: PAX SAFETY switch position, checklist status.

Observability: TARS must display sensed light switch status.
Predictability: Pilot expects TARS to suggest if it is suggested based on time of day.
Information Requirement: Current runway conditions, weather, and aircraft status.

Observability: TARS display ANTI-COLL light switch status to pilot.
Predictability: Pilot expects TARS to alert if ANTI-COLL light switch is off.
Information Requirement: ANTI-COLL light switch position, checklist status.

Observability: TARS displays radar status to pilot and requirement.
Information Requirement: Radar status, weather data, obstacle proximity.
EICAS visible
Runway alignment, wind speed/direction, aircraft heading.

Observability: TARS displays available wind data and status. Pilot can enrich by crosschecking with visual information
Directability: Both can perform in parallel and crosscheck
Information Requirement: Wind speed, direction, runway alignment.
Brake pressure, runway position, ATC clearance status.
ATC clearance
CAS status, system alerts, checklist progress.

Observability: The performer must callout the action before executing it and after execution
Information Requirement: Throttle position, engine parameters, runway conditions.

Observability: TARS displays FADEC status changes to pilot.
Directability: TARS direct human to RTO if FADEC fails
Information Requirement: FADEC status, engine parameters, TARS action log.

Observability: Human sees TARS status on engine checks; TARS sees human's manual inputs.
Directability: TARS direct human to RTO if engine spool is not even
Information Requirement: Engine RPM, temperature, pressure, and spool rate.

Observability: Human must see TARS' instrument check status updates.
Directability: TARS direct human to RTO if engine spool is not even
Information Requirement: Engine RPM, oil pressure, temperature, fuel flow.
Brake status, takeoff checklist completion.

Observability: TARS must display airspeed. Pilot must be able to hear announcement
Predictability: Pilot must anticipate TARS's "Airspeed's alive" announcement timing.
Information Requirement: Current airspeed, runway conditions, aircraft weight.

Observability: TARS must display airspeed; Human must hear TARS' "70 kts" announcement.
Predictability: Human expects TARS to announce "70 kts" at correct speed.
Information Requirement: Airspeed, current phase of takeoff.

Observability: TARS must display airspeed; Human must hear TARS' "V1" announcement.
Predictability: TARS announces "V1" timing based on takeoff speed and runway conditions.
Information Requirement: Current airspeed, runway length, aircraft weight, wind conditions.

Observability: TARS must display airspeed; Human must hear TARS' "ROTATE" announcement.
Predictability: TARS announces "ROTATE" timing based on takeoff speed and runway conditions.
Information Requirement: Airspeed, runway length, aircraft weight, wind conditions.
Airspeed, Vr speed, pitch attitude, runway length remaining.
Current pitch angle, target pitch, airspeed, altitude.

Predictability: Pilot expects TARS to alert if slip/skid exceeds safe limits.
Information Requirement: Slip/skid indicator, airspeed, heading, bank angle.

Observability: The performer must announce the result of the check and the subsequent action
Information Requirement: Current climb rate, target climb rate, altitude, airspeed.

Observability: TARS confirms pilot's gear action.
Information Requirement: Gear position, airspeed, altitude, climb rate.

Observability: TARS displays agreed safe altitude (1000ft)
TARS displays current flight director mode and status changes to pilot.
Predictability: TARS communicates intended flight director mode changes before execution.
Directability: Pilot can override or confirm TARS's flight director mode changes via voice command.
Information Requirement: Current flight director mode, engine status, autopilot engagement.
Current pitch angle, engine status, autopilot engagement.

Observability: TARS displays gear status and alerts pilot of any anomalies.
Information Requirement: Engine status, gear position, airspeed, altitude.

Observability: TARS displays current airspeed and V2 status to pilot.
Information Requirement: Current airspeed, V2 speed, engine status.

Observability: TARS displays rudder trim status. TARS display its own adjustments, TARS announce each trim input
Predictability: TARS announces intended rudder trim adjustments before execution. TARS always execute the equivalent of a single input on the electric trim
Directability: Pilot can override or adjust TARS rudder trim actions via voice command.
Information Requirement: Engine status, current rudder trim position, airspeed, and yaw rate.

Observability: Human must see TARS's alarm status.
Directability: Human can confirm TARS's alarm callout via voice command.
Information Requirement: Engine status, alarm type, current flight phase.
Engine status, Master Warning status, ATC frequency.

Observability: Performer must callout safe altitude reached
Information Requirement: Current altitude, agreed safe altitude

Observability: TARS monitors pilot's throttle actions. TARS can help announce the side of the thrust lever and the action to conduct. The pilot must callout the action
Information Requirement: Engine status, throttle position, fire warning.

Observability: The performer must callout the action, TARS must display the chrono status
Predictability: HUMAN should know when the timer is set off.
Directability: Pilot can override or redirect TARS actions via voice commands.
Information Requirement: Engine status, fire detection, extinguisher status, ATC communication status.

Observability: TARS must display the chrono status and engine fire light status
Information Requirement: Engine fire status, checklist progress, TARS action log.

Observability: TARS monitors pilot's actions. HUMAN must callout the action
Information Requirement: Engine fire status, TARS communication readiness, ATC frequency.

Observability: TARS must display autopilot mode changes to the pilot.
Predictability: TARS should indicate upcoming autopilot adjustments.
Directability: Pilot can override TARS autopilot settings via voice command.
Information Requirement: Current airspeed, target speed, engine status.

Observability: Human sees TARS autopilot mode changes.
Predictability: Human anticipates TARS heading adjustments.
Directability: Human commands TARS via voice for heading changes.
Information Requirement: Current heading, target heading, engine status.

Observability: Performer must callout the action. TARS displays autopilot status changes to pilot.
Predictability: Pilot anticipates TARS's autopilot engagement sequence.
Directability: Pilot can override TARS's autopilot actions via command.
Information Requirement: Engine status, autopilot mode, runway length remaining.

Observability: TARS displays current altitude.
Information Requirement: Altitude, engine status, autopilot mode, ATC clearance.

Observability: TARS displays airspeed and V2+10 status to pilot.
Information Requirement: Current airspeed, V2+10 target, engine status.
Engine status, obstacle proximity, runway length, weather conditions.

Observability: TARS can support by calling out the action.
Information Requirement: Flap handle position, engine status, airspeed.
V_ENR value, current airspeed

Observability: TARS must display ATC communication status to the pilot.
Predictability: Pilot must anticipate TARS's next ATC message.
Directability: Pilot can override TARS's ATC communication with voice command.
Information Requirement: Engine status, ATC frequency, emergency checklist.
Engine status, runway length remaining, ATC frequency.

Observability: TARS displays current checklist step and expected worklow.
Predictability: TARS anticipates pilot's checklist step confirmations; pilot expects TARS to announce next steps.
Directability: Pilot can override or modify TARS actions via voice command. pilot confirms checklist initiation.
Information Requirement: Engine temperature, fire detection status, fuel shutoff valve position.

Observability: Pilot confirms
Information Requirement: Engine temperature, pressure, fire detection status, checklist steps.

Observability: TARS can support the pilot by calling out the action
Information Requirement: Engine fire alert, throttle position, engine temperature.

Observability: TARS can support the pilot by calling out the action
Information Requirement: Engine fire status, fuel boost switch position.

Observability: TARS can support the pilot by calling out the action
Information Requirement: Engine fire status, fuel boost switch position, checklist progress.

Observability: TARS must display checklist progress and status to the pilot.
Information Requirement: Engine status, FIRE LIGHT status, checklist steps.

Observability: The pilot must callout the action
Information Requirement: Engine fire status, BOTTLE ARMED switch position.

Observability: TARS monitors pilot's actions.
Information Requirement: FIRE WARN status, engine parameters, ATC frequency.

Observability: TARS monitors pilot's actions.
Information Requirement: Engine fire status, TARS communication status.

Observability: TARS displays checklist progress; pilot confirms task completion.
Predictability: TARS anticipates pilot's checklist initiation;
Directability: Pilot can postpone the execution
Information Requirement: Engine status, fire indicators, checklist steps, ATC communication status.

Observability: TARS must display checklist progress to the pilot.
Information Requirement: Engine status, fire indicators, checklist steps.

Observability: TARS must display ATC communication message to the pilot.
Predictability: Pilot must anticipate TARS's emergency declaration timing.
Directability: Pilot can override or confirm TARS's emergency declaration.
Information Requirement: Current aircraft status, ATC frequency, emergency nature.

Observability: TARS must display ATC communication message to the pilot.
Predictability: Pilot must anticipate TARS's next communication with ATC.
Directability: Pilot can override or confirm TARS's actions via voice command.
Information Requirement: Current flight path, emergency status, ATC frequency, vector instructions.

Observability: TARS displays checklist progress and status updates to pilot.
Predictability: Pilot anticipates TARS's checklist sequence and timing.
Directability: Pilot can postpone checklist execution.
Information Requirement: Aircraft configuration, engine status, flight path, checklist items.

Observability: TARS must display gear status.
Information Requirement: Gear status, airspeed, altitude.

Observability: Human sees TARS' airspeed checks and status updates.
Information Requirement: Current airspeed, V2 speed, aircraft configuration.
Obstacle proximity, aircraft altitude, climb rate.

Observability: TARS must display flap status.
Predictability: Human must anticipate TARS's verbal reminders for flap retraction.
Information Requirement: Flap position, airspeed, altitude, and climb rate.

Observability: TARS must display throttle detent status to pilot.
Information Requirement: Throttle position, climb rate, engine performance data.

Observability: TARS displays yaw damper status changes to pilot.
Predictability: TARS anticipates pilot's yaw damper adjustments.
Directability: Pilot commands TARS to adjust yaw damper settings.
Information Requirement: Yaw damper status, aircraft attitude, flight phase.

Observability: TARS displays anti-ice system status; pilot confirms visual indicators.
Predictability: TARS alerts pilot of potential anti-ice activation needs.
Information Requirement: Outside air temperature, wing surface status, system activation status.

Observability: TARS must display PAX SAFETY switch status to pilot and requirement.
Information Requirement: PAX SAFETY switch position, checklist status.

Observability: TARS must display landing light status to the pilot and requirement.
Predictability: Pilot must anticipate TARS's reminders for landing light status.
Information Requirement: Landing light switch position, current flight phase.

Observability: TARS displays pressurization status to pilot.
Predictability: TARS anticipates pilot's pressurization check initiation.
Information Requirement: Cabin altitude, differential pressure, system status.

Observability: TARS displays altimeter setting changes; pilot confirms via cockpit display.
Predictability: TARS anticipates pilot's altimeter setting, pilot anticipates TARS altimeter setting
Directability: Pilot commands TARS to set altimeter to standard pressure.
Information Requirement: Current altitude, transition altitude, standard pressure setting.

Observability: Human must confirm crosscheck.
Information Requirement: Current altimeter setting, transition altitude.

Observability: TARS displays checklist status; pilot confirms task completion visually/audibly.
Predictability: TARS anticipates pilot's checklist completion cues; pilot expects TARS to announce.
Information Requirement: Checklist items, task status, aircraft configuration.

Observability: TARS displays checklist progress.
Predictability: TARS announces next checklist step before execution.
Directability: Pilot can override TARS actions via voice command.
Information Requirement: Engine status, autopilot mode, ATC communication status.

Observability: TARS displays checklist progress.
Predictability: TARS announces next checklist step before execution.
Directability: Pilot can override TARS actions via voice command.
Information Requirement: Engine status, fuel levels, system alerts.

Observability: TARS displays engine status and monitor pilot's actions.
Information Requirement: Engine RPM, fuel flow, oil pressure, and temperature.

Directability: Pilot can override TARS actions; TARS prompts pilot for confirmation.
Information Requirement: Engine status, checklist steps, ATC communication status, autopilot engagement.

Observability: TARS displays GEN switch status and monitor pilot's actions.
Information Requirement: GEN switch status, engine parameters, checklist steps.

Observability: TARS displays IGN switch status and monitor pilot's actions.
Information Requirement: Ignition switch status, engine performance data.

Observability: TARS must display current electrical load and recommendations.
Predictability: Human must anticipate TARS's suggestions for load reduction.
Directability: Human can command TARS to suggest specific load reduction actions.
Information Requirement: Current electrical load, available systems to shed, load reduction targets.

Observability: TARS must display fuel transfer status to pilot.
Information Requirement: Fuel levels, transfer knob position, engine status.

Observability: Human sees TARS status on ENGINE FIRE switch engagement.
Predictability: Human anticipates TARS will verify switch engagement.
Directability: Human can override TARS actions via verbal command.
Information Requirement: ENGINE FIRE switch status, engine parameters.

Observability: TARS displays checklist progress.
Predictability: TARS anticipates pilot's checklist initiation.
Directability: Pilot can command TARS to adjust checklist priorities; TARS suggests checklist priorities.
Information Requirement: Engine status, checklist steps, autopilot settings, ATC communications.
